name: Haus Hoflacher
description: Holiday apartment in Brandberg. Quiet, sunny position. Direct booking in summer; In winter, bookings through Interchalet, or last minute directly with the landlord.

Included in price: Bed linen and towels, electricity, water, heating.
Excludes: final cleaning charge.

Check in: 16.00hr / Check out 09.00hr.
Just before Mayrhofen turn left in the direction of Brandberg, through the tunnel, then right into the village of Brandberg. Turn right just before the fire brigade station.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower and bath, toilet, 4 or more bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Holiday apartment in Brandberg for 8-10 persons, sunny position, 5 minutes walk from the ski bus. Kitchen, large lounge, 4 bedrooms, two of which with shower, bath, shower, 2 X WC, large balcony.
